column1: The long dark night in America is over.  A new dawn is coming.  And we can make that dawn even brighter by winning in Georgia.

Joe Biden will win Georgia and so many other states because his agenda brings America together and helps working families.  The best way to ensure that positive agenda can deliver help to working families in Georgia and nationwide is to elect Raphael Warnock and Jon Ossoff.
Joe Biden will be a great President for all Americans.  Kamala Harris will be a great VIce President for all Americans.
If you're in Georgia or you know anyone in Georgia make sure you see this: https://t.co/xt4FDLk7NK
#CancelStudentDebt https://t.co/c2MrLFMPDw
We need bold action on climate change.  But Donald Trump has tried to tell us that Earth will somehow just start getting cooler.

President Trump is working to rip away health care from millions of Americans.  President Trump is working to end protections for pre-existing conditions.  Democrats will not stop fighting for health care. https://t.co/Y2Vgs3bmVi
220000 lives lost to COVID.   But President Trump still won't stop lying.

President Trump just keeps lying that he has some magical health care plan right around the corner.  The truth: He's suing to rip away health care from millions.  And he's trying to ram through a Justice to help their case.  Democrats will not stop fighting for your health care

Things not mentioned at the RNC tonight:  Senate Republicans have been blocking legislation to restore the Voting Rights Act for 263 days.
Things not mentioned at the RNC tonight:  President Trump and the Republicans are suing to rip away protections for millions of Americans with pre-existing conditions.

The Trump administration’s health care sabotage and weak inadequate coronavirus response has been aided and abetted by Congressional Republicans.  We are fighting to elect Joe Biden elect Kamala Harris and #FlipTheSenate.  https://t.co/ZxhXXzNzWn

President Trump actually started off Monday saying that he would defend protections for Americans with pre-existing conditions.  But the fact is President Trump and Republicans are suing to end our healthcare law and rip away coverage from millions with pre-existing conditions!

We are experiencing the greatest health crisis this country has seen in 100 years.   Of course the truth is: ever since Donald Trump became president he’s been relentless in attacking Americans’ health care.

Donald Trump made his name in reality TV but their convention has been more like Sur-reality TV.  Over 170000 Americans have died from COVID but they pretend Donald Trump has a handle on the virus.  Republicans have spent their convention trying to Papier-mâché over this.
Things not mentioned at the RNC tonight:   The Hatch Act
Things not mentioned at the RNC tonight:  Donald Trump has promoted a Muslim Ban caged and separated immigrant kids has defied the Supreme Court on DACA and refused to protect Dreamers.
It's simple: we need a president who will help contain and stop this virus. @JoeBiden will be that President.  https://t.co/kvIO1nC0Cu

Things not mentioned at the RNC tonight:   While tonight claiming to be the party of free speech let’s remember that Donald Trump teargassed American citizens without provocation so that he could pose for a photo op.

With President @JoeBiden Vice President @KamalaHarris and a Democratic Senate Majority:   We will reform our immigration system so that immigrants yearning to breathe free will at last become American citizens.  #FlipTheSenate
With President @JoeBiden Vice President @KamalaHarris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We’ll take strong decisive action to combat climate change and save the planet.  #FlipTheSenate

Senator @KamalaHarris is absolutely right.  When we vote things change.  When we vote things get better.  Make a plan to vote.  https://t.co/qtm0zd9tGP

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will protect voting rights.  We will save the post office.   We will restore a Supreme Court that looks out for people not corporations.  #DemConvention  #FlipTheSenate https://t.co/st7Zl4lNot
Looking forward to tonight’s incredible lineup!   Who are you excited to watch? #DemConvention: https://t.co/iacmcl8F5n https://t.co/16zZSGCnZX
My friend @ReverendWarnock’s first TV ad is live! Watch it now and help us #FlipTheSenate  👇👇👇 https://t.co/8tMbD8FOvU

Together we can re-ignite the hope once felt by millions of men and women huddled masses on creaking ships who glimpsed the Statue of Liberty this mighty woman with her torch knowing they could build a better life here in America.
With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will reform our immigration system so that immigrants yearning to breathe free will at last become American citizens.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We’ll rebuild our infrastructure and make sure every home from inner city to rural America has broadband.  We will save the post office and once and for all defeat COVID-19 this evil disease.
A teacher. A mother. Decent. Empathetic. Powerful. @DrBiden is going to be America's next First Lady. #DemConvention

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will protect voting rights.  We will fight systemic racism in the criminal justice system and in our economy.  We will restore a Supreme Court that looks out for people not corporations.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will make healthcare affordable for all.  We’ll undo the vicious inequality of wealth that has plagued America.  We’ll take strong decisive action to combat climate change and save the planet.
I am in awe of @AdyBarkan. And he's right: We all have an obligation to take action!  And we will not stop fighting to make healthcare affordable for all.  #DemConvention #FlipTheSenate
If we’re going to win this battle for the soul of our nation:  Democrats must take back the Senate.  We will stay united.  And with our unity we will bring bold and dramatic change to our country.

We need a president with dignity integrity and the experience to lead us out of this crisis.  A man with a steady hand and a big heart who will never—ever—quit on America.  That man is my friend @JoeBiden.
America: Donald Trump has quit on you.

Presidents should never say: “it is what it is.”  President Lincoln honoring the great sacrifice at Gettysburg didn’t say “it is what it is.”  President Roosevelt seeing a third of the nation ill-housed ill-clad and ill-nourished didn’t say “it is what it is.”

Donald Trump has divided our country and diminished our greatness.  He hid in a bunker as Americans were tear gassed and beaten.  Millions are jobless. 170000 have died from COVID.  And Donald Trump says: “it is what it is.”

America Donald Trump has quit on you.  Our country needs bold and dramatic change.  With President @JoeBiden Vice President @KamalaHarris and a Democratic Senate Majority here's what we'd achieve.  #DemConvention #FlipTheSenate https://t.co/SDYwgH4Mjl https://t.co/gQ4hyxj3c6
This roll call is a wonderful road trip across America and we're seeing Democrats nominate the next President of the United States @JoeBiden to push for bold change. #DemConvention

Together we can re-ignite the hope once felt by millions of men and women huddled masses on creaking ships who glimpsed the Statue of Liberty this mighty woman with her torch knowing they could build a better life here in America.
With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will reform our immigration system so that immigrants yearning to breathe free will at last become American citizens.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We’ll rebuild our infrastructure and make sure every home from inner city to rural America has broadband.  We will save the post office and once and for all defeat COVID-19 this evil disease.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will protect voting rights.  We will fight systemic racism in the criminal justice system and in our economy.  We will restore a Supreme Court that looks out for people not corporations.

With President Biden Vice President Harris and a Democratic Senate Majority:  We will make healthcare affordable for all.  We’ll undo the vicious inequality of wealth that has plagued America.  We’ll take strong decisive action to combat climate change and save the planet.
If we’re going to win this battle for the soul of our nation:  Democrats must take back the Senate.  We will stay united.  And with our unity we will bring bold and dramatic change to our country.

We need a president with dignity integrity and the experience to lead us out of this crisis.  A man with a steady hand and a big heart who will never—ever—quit on America.  That man is my friend @JoeBiden.
America: Donald Trump has quit on you.

Presidents should never say: “it is what it is.”  President Lincoln honoring the great sacrifice at Gettysburg didn’t say “it is what it is.”  President Roosevelt seeing a third of the nation ill-housed ill-clad and ill-nourished didn’t say “it is what it is.”

Donald Trump has divided our country and diminished our greatness.  He hid in a bunker as Americans were tear gassed and beaten.  Millions are jobless. 170000 have died from COVID.  And Donald Trump says: “it is what it is.

Behind me is a sight I see every night—the Statue of Liberty  It greeted hopeful immigrants like my grandparents  A symbol of freedom. A beacon of hope to the world.  Today Donald Trump has divided our country diminished our greatness demeaned everything this statue represents

Joe Biden is showing courage strength and foresight in putting forward his far-reaching proposal and including Clean Cars for America in this bold plan.  Taking necessary action to confront the climate crisis is a top priority for Democrats in Congress.  https://t.co/WROSpKKoUI

My Clean Cars for America initiative would accelerate America’s transition to all-electric vehicles on the road by 2040 and create good-paying jobs.  And it's supported by a diverse coalition of environmental labor and auto leaders.  https://t.co/WROSpKKoUI

Vice President Biden’s bold clean energy and infrastructure plan is a breath of fresh air for America’s future.  I am so proud that @JoeBiden has included my Clean Cars for America plan as part of his energy and infrastructure proposal.  https://t.co/WROSpKKoUI
I’m proud @JoeBiden is including my Clean Cars For America proposal in his climate plan.  https://t.co/WROSpKKoUI

I fought alongside @BernieSanders to ensure a Senate vote in July on his amendment to reduce $740B defense budget 10%  We'll put the money to priorities like health care housing childcare in communities with 25%+ poverty including many communities of color  Proudly support it

His continuing commitment to these fights -- and to defeating the divisive and damaging Trump presidency -- is statesmanlike and will permanently inure to his credit.

I’m so proud of history-maker Assemblywoman Rodneyse Bichotte @AMBichotte for becoming chair of the Brooklyn Democratic Party. I look forward to continuing to work with her to fight for Brooklyn and for a more just America.
